attributes.action: Change back to the old Doctors appoinment system
attributes.additional_details: This petition is being created because i want to go back to the old Doctors appoinment system, when you could phone up a Doctor and arrrange to see one straight away, but the new system, you now have to phone up, and insted of getting an appoinment, you have to wait for someone from the triage team to phone you, and if you want to book an appointment to see an Nurse or a Doctor now, you have to book it two weeks in advance, which i think and so do many other people i have spoken to, which is unacceptable.
